EmailTemplate.name: EISF Confirmation2017
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for stopping by!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It was a pleasure to meet you at the Eastern Idaho State Fair today. You have officially been entered to win our custom Honda Ruckus*!
At Idaho Central Credit Union, our team is ready and willing to help you achieve financial success.
Stop by your local branch today! We have a solution to help you with all of your financial needs.
• Checking and Savings • Home Loans • Auto & RV Loans • Low-rate Visas, including Rewards • Free eBranch Online Banking • And much more
For more information, visit your local branch or iccu.com today!
*To view official rules click here. No purchase or membership necessary. One entry per person. Eligible participants must be 18 years of age or older and possess a valid form of identification. Form must be complete to be valid. All entries must be submitted by 9/10/2016.
